explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a black screen, displaying a tweet from @TankMemer at the top, with white subtitles below.

[0-2] Then the scene switches to a room, where a man and a little girl in a tactical vest are present. The man, wearing a black baseball cap and black sportswear, holds the girl's right arm with both hands. The girl, with long brown hair, is dressed in a black outfit and white shoes, her right foot stepping on the man's thigh and her left hand gripping his arm. The scene then transitions to a dimly lit room with a black ceiling and walls. A row of red light strips adorns the right side of the ceiling. A man with black curly hair stands in the room, wearing a dark gray T-shirt and a necklace, tossing a brown plush toy backward with both hands. A red broken heart icon is displayed on the screen.

A little girl with a brown ponytail stands next to him, wearing a black short-sleeved shirt and dark gray pants, her hands covered in black gloves. Behind them stands the man with black curly hair, wearing a wine-red T-shirt and holding a brown teddy bear in his hands. A bandaged heart icon is displayed on the screen.
